prompts.title: Gratitude challenge
prompts.description: What are three things you're grateful for today, and why are you grateful for these things?

prompts.title: Kindness stories
prompts.description: Can you recall a time when you helped someone or when someone helped you in a meaningful way? How did it make you feel?

prompts.title: Empowering statements
prompts.description: What are five personal power statements that showcase your unique talents, skills, or characteristics?

prompts.title: Dream big
prompts.description: What would your ultimate dream life look like in the future, where everything has gone incredibly well? What have you achieved?

prompts.title: Memory lane
prompts.description: What is a happy memory from your past? Can you describe the details and feelings associated with the memory?

prompts.title: Compliment challenge
prompts.description: How did you feel when you last brightened someone's day by giving them three genuine compliments? What was their reaction?

prompts.title: Proud moments
prompts.description: What are three moments, accomplishments, or personal qualities that make you proud of who you are?

prompts.title: Epic experiences
prompts.description: Can you describe a recent experience that you thoroughly enjoyed? What made it awesome, and how did it make you feel?

prompts.title: Happy place
prompts.description: What does your ideal happy place look like? Can you use your senses to describe the sights, sounds, and feelings in this special location?

prompts.title: Mindful moments
prompts.description: After taking a few minutes to focus on your breath or the sensations in your body, how did it make you feel and what did you notice during the practice?

prompts.title: Personal growth
prompts.description: What challenge have you overcome in the past, and how did it contribute to your personal growth? How did it make you a stronger or more resilient person?

prompts.title: Inspiring role models
prompts.description: Who is someone you admire or look up to? What qualities do you find inspiring about them, and how have they influenced your life?

prompts.title: Future goals
prompts.description: What are three goals you would like to achieve in the next year, and how will accomplishing these goals make you feel?

prompts.title: Cherished values
prompts.description: What are your top three personal values, and why are they important to you? Can you share examples of how you've embodied these values in your life?

prompts.title: Creative expression
prompts.description: What is a creative activity (drawing, painting, writing, playing music, etc.) that brings you joy? How does it make you feel, and why is it important to you?

prompts.title: Connecting with nature
prompts.description: After spending some time outside, observing and appreciating the beauty of nature, what observations did you make, and how did it make you feel?

prompts.title: Laughter therapy
prompts.description: When was the last time you watched a funny video or listened to a humorous podcast, and how did laughter positively impact your mood?

prompts.title: Social connections
prompts.description: When was the last time you reached out to a friend or family member you haven't talked to in a while? What was a positive update about your life that you shared, and how were they doing?

prompts.title: Curiosity and learning
prompts.description: What is something new that you've learned recently that interests you (a hobby, a skill, or an interesting fact)?

prompts.title: Self-care routines
prompts.description: What does your self-care routine look like, and how do the activities included promote your physical, mental, and emotional well-being? How does this routine impact your overall mood and well-being?
